summary: Load an externally stored batch job result
description:
Loads and executes a publicly available batch job result by URI from the current back-end or another back-end. The response from the remote server needs to be compatible with the corresponsing API response to *download information for a completed job*.

Please be aware that this process may transfer a lot of data between servers.

url.description: An URI to a publicly available batch job result.

returns.description: A data cube for further processing.

links.title: API specification to download information for a completed job
